system.description:
You have moved beyond standard magical training into the specialized training befitting one who is to stand against threats to the world itself. At this stage you are a neophyte and are often under the tutelage of a more experienced Proscriber, though in times of crisis, even very inexperienced Proscribers may be sent out to do what they can against the darkness.

You gain proficiency with the Arcana and Religion skills, or gain an expertise die if you are already proficient. You also gain the Aberrations skill specialty for Arcana and the Fiends skill specialty for religion. You may select another skill specialty for a relevant skill if you already possess one of these skill specialties.

In addition, you learn one of the most important and dangerous techniques of the Proscriber order. If you are affected by the charmed, confused, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, or stunned conditions, you may choose to spend a hit die and gain a level of strife (no action required). The condition ends immediately.
